#summary List of TODOs / enhancements for ZooViewer

= Introduction =

This page details every new feature or existing feature enhancement.<br>
Accepted TODOs should become issues.


= Details =

  # _Copy/Cut-Paste feature_
   * The user should be able to Cut or Copy a node, and Paste it in another node.<br>
  # _Save to file / Load from file feature_
   * The user should be able to save the selected node (and its children) into a file.
   * The user should be able to load a file and insert the nodes above the selected one.
